reviews.review: love the movie. the singing parts not so much lol

This movie was all over the place. The plot is too extreme for children to understand and this movie was more of a musical but with no songs to remember like “let it go”. It was enjoyable but wanted more magic and a better plot.

Love the plot .. story and the sense of humor of Olaf was incredible .. entire theater was laughing :) .. my 4 year old that doesn’t seat through movies was mesmerized by the forest giants :) they are his favorite now .. I love Disney movies so I love this cartoon .. the message of love and making right instead of wrong to create peace is pretty powerful .. I wish people implemented this messages into their lives ... world became little too dark

The first time I saw this movie I was slightly disappointed. Going into seeing it I had soo many expectations and things i wanted to see happen!  However upon seeing it again I realized that I can’t be upset that the story took a different direction and ended up loving it with this new outlook! I am also completely addicted to the songs! Into the unknown and show yourself is sooo good! And that sound that appears through the movie “ahh ahhh ahh ahhh” (sorry I tried) is stuck in my head and I love it ! Great sequel!!!  And very funny- Olaf crushes it!
It was geared towards and older crowd for kids.
Would definitely pay to watch this movie again

I was a fan of the first Frozen, but never really was obsessed with it until recently. When I saw Frozen 2 for the first time i didn't know what to expect. The visuals were stunning, the music blew me out of the water, it gave me chills, story line was great, and animation.. WOAH. Half of the time i didn't even realized im watching an animated film! 

It's absolutely amazing.
Movie was awesome. The kids loved it and want to see it again!!
Definitely made me emotional when she finally made it to her destination!

I loved the story line of this movie! Funny, sad and happy moments. Olaf certainly makes the movie! The songs may grow on me down the road but for now I think I did enjoy the songs from the first movie more probably because they were a little more upbeat and catchy. They did a great job with this movie!
